entry.value: update PROBE_DETAIL set LAST_NOTIFIED_TIME=from_unixtime(${lastnotifiedtime}),COUNTER=0,NOTIFIED=${notified},MODIFIED_TIME=from_unixtime(${lastnotifiedtime}) , STATUS='${status}' where ID=${ID}

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.value: HTTP Method,Remote URL,disable-http2,SSL Context Service,Trusted Hostname,Add Response Headers to Request,Content-Type,send-message-body,Use Chunked Encoding,Connection Timeout,Penalize on "No Retry",use-etag,etag-max-cache-size,ignore-response-content,set-form-filename,apikey,Authorization,Read Timeout,idle-timeout,JWT token,max-idle-connections,Include Date Header,Follow Redirects

select t1.eventTime,CASE WHEN t1.KPI='DOWNLOAD' THEN json->>'$.dlThreshold' WHEN t1.KPI='UPLOAD' THEN json->>'$.ulThreshold' WHEN t1.KPI='BROWSE' THEN json->>'$.ttlThreshold' WHEN t1.KPI='YOUTUBE_TEST' THEN json->>'$.bufferTimeThreshold' WHEN t1.KPI='PING' THEN json->>'$.latencyThreshold' END as thresholdValue,t1.KPI as alarmKPI,t1.ID as probeDetailFk,0 as counter,1 as notified,json->>'$.emailList' as emailIds,json->>'$.ttlThreshold' as ttlThreshold,json->>'$.latencyThreshold' as latencyThreshold,json->>'$.bufferTimeThreshold' as bufferTimeThreshold,json->>'$.dlThreshold' as dlThreshold,json->>'$.ulThreshold' as ulThreshold,json->>'$.dlThresholdUnit' as dlThresholdUnit,json->>'$.ulThresholdUnit' as ulThresholdUnit,t1.* from (select json_objectagg(ENTITY_TYPE,ENTITY_VALUE) as json,probe.* from GWO_META gwo,(select p.MODIFIED_TIME as eventTime,di.DEVICE_ID as deviceId,g.WORKORDER_ID as workorderid,pd.PROBE_NAME as userName,unix_timestamp(p.MODIFIED_TIME) as modifiedtime,unix_timestamp(p.MODIFIED_TIME) as lastnotifiedtime,p.STATUS,p.ID,p.LATITUDE as latitude,p.LONGITUDE as longitude,p.TECHNOLOGY as technology,case when p.CGI is not null then p.CGI else '-' end as cgiValue,std.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK,case when p.RSRP is not null then cast(p.RSRP as signed) else '-' end as rsrp,case when p.SINR is not null then round(p.SINR,1) else '-' end as sinr,case when p.PCI is not null then p.PCI else '-' end as pci,p.CGI as cgi,case when p.ENODEB_ID is not null then p.ENODEB_ID else '-' end as enodebId,case when p.CELLID is not null then p.CELLID else '-' end as cellId,p.KPI,case when p.VALUE is not null and p.VALUE <> 'null' then p.VALUE else '-' end as value,p.ADDRESS as location,date_format(p.MODIFIED_TIME,'%h:%i:%s %p') as time,case when p.SSRSRP is not null then cast(p.SSRSRP as signed) else '-' end as ssrsrp,case when p.SSSINR is not null then cast(p.SSSINR as signed) else '-' end as sssinr,case when p.NRPCI is not null then cast(p.NRPCI as signed) else '-' end as nrpci,'-' as nrCgi,'-' as nrCellId,'-' as gNodeBId from PROBE_DETAIL p, STEALTH_TASK_RESULT str, STEALTH_TASK_DETAIL std,PROBE_DEVICE pd,NV_DEVICE nv,DEVICE_INFO di,GENERIC_WORKORDER g where p.KPI in ('DOWNLOAD','UPLOAD','BROWSE','YOUTUBE_TEST','PING') and p.STATUS='Fail' and p.NOTIFIED=0 and p.STEALTH_TASK_RESULT_FK=str.ID and str.STEALTH_TASK_DETAIL_FK=std.ID and std.PROBE_DEVICE_FK=pd.ID and pd.NVDEVICE_FK=nv.ID and nv.DEVICE_INFO_FK=di.ID and std.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK=g.ID and g.STATUS='INPROGRESS') as probe where gwo.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK=probe.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK and gwo.ENTITY_TYPE in ('emailList','ttlThreshold','latencyThreshold','bufferTimeThreshold','ulThreshold','dlThreshold','ulThresholdUnit','dlThresholdUnit') group by probe.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK ) as t1;
Database Connection Pooling Service,SQL select query,Record Mode,Max Wait Time

select 0 as counter,1 as notified,json->>'$.emailList' as emailIds,t1.* from (select json_objectagg(ENTITY_TYPE,ENTITY_VALUE) as json,probe.* from GWO_META gwo,(select di.DEVICE_ID as deviceId,g.WORKORDER_ID as workorderid,pd.PROBE_NAME as userName,unix_timestamp(p.MODIFIED_TIME) as modifiedtime,unix_timestamp(p.MODIFIED_TIME) as lastnotifiedtime,p.STATUS,p.ID,p.LATITUDE as latitude,p.LONGITUDE as longitude,p.TECHNOLOGY as technology,case when p.CGI is not null then p.CGI else '-' end as cgiValue,std.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK,case when p.RSRP is not null then cast(p.RSRP as signed) else '-' end as rsrp,case when p.SINR is not null then round(p.SINR,1) else '-' end as sinr,case when p.PCI is not null then p.PCI else '-' end as pci,p.CGI as cgi,case when p.ENODEB_ID is not null then p.ENODEB_ID else '-' end as enodebId,case when p.CELLID is not null then p.CELLID else '-' end as cellId,p.KPI,case when p.VALUE is not null then p.VALUE else '-' end as value,p.ADDRESS as location,date_format(p.MODIFIED_TIME,'%h:%i:%s %p') as time,case when p.SSRSRP is not null then cast(p.SSRSRP as signed) else '-' end as ssrsrp,case when p.SSSINR is not null then cast(p.SSSINR as signed) else '-' end as sssinr,case when p.NRPCI is not null then cast(p.NRPCI as signed) else '-' end as nrpci,'-' as nrCgi,'-' as nrCellId,'-' as gNodeBId from PROBE_DETAIL p, STEALTH_TASK_RESULT str, STEALTH_TASK_DETAIL std,PROBE_DEVICE pd,NV_DEVICE nv,DEVICE_INFO di,GENERIC_WORKORDER g where p.KPI in ('Connectivity') and p.STATUS in ('Network Switch','Network Restore') and p.NOTIFIED=0 and p.STEALTH_TASK_RESULT_FK=str.ID and str.STEALTH_TASK_DETAIL_FK=std.ID and std.PROBE_DEVICE_FK=pd.ID and pd.NVDEVICE_FK=nv.ID and nv.DEVICE_INFO_FK=di.ID and std.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK=g.ID and g.STATUS='INPROGRESS') as probe where gwo.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK=probe.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK and gwo.ENTITY_TYPE in ('emailList','technology') group by probe.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK ) as t1;
Database Connection Pooling Service,SQL select query,Record Mode,Max Wait Time

select p.MODIFIED_TIME as eventTime,p.ID as probeDetailFk, null as thresholdValue,'CONNECTIVITY SUCCESS' as alarmKPI,p.STATUS,p.TECHNOLOGY as technology,0 as notified,CAST(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(gwo.META,'$.emailList'))as CHAR) as emailIds,p.COUNTER as counter,gw.ID,p.ID,p.LATITUDE as latitude,p.LONGITUDE as longitude,case when p.RSRP is not null then cast(p.RSRP as signed) else '-' end as rsrp,case when p.SINR is not null then round(p.SINR,1) else '-' end as sinr,case when p.PCI is not null then p.PCI else '-' end as pci,p.CGI,case when p.ENODEB_ID is not null then p.ENODEB_ID else '-' end as enodebId,case when p.CELLID is not null then p.CELLID else '-' end as cellId,case when p.CGI is not null then p.CGI else '-' end as cgiValue,p.KPI,p.VALUE as value,p.ADDRESS as location,date_format(p.MODIFIED_TIME,'%h:%i:%s %p') as time,unix_timestamp(p.MODIFIED_TIME) as modifiedtime,case when p.SSRSRP is not null then cast(p.SSRSRP as signed) else '-' end as ssrsrp,case when p.SSSINR is not null then cast(p.SSSINR as signed) else '-' end as sssinr,case when p.NRPCI is not null then cast(p.NRPCI as signed) else '-' end as nrpci,'-' as nrCgi,'-' as nrCellId,'-' as gNodeBId,unix_timestamp(p.MODIFIED_TIME) as lastnotifiedtime,concat(case when hour(timediff(now(),p.LAST_NOTIFIED_TIME)) <> 0 then concat(hour(timediff(now(),p.LAST_NOTIFIED_TIME)),' hours ')else '' end,minute(timediff(now(),p.LAST_NOTIFIED_TIME))) as lastReportedTime,pd.PROBE_NAME as userName,di.DEVICE_ID as deviceId,gw.WORKORDER_ID as workorderid from PROBE_DETAIL p , STEALTH_TASK_RESULT str, STEALTH_TASK_DETAIL std,PROBE_DEVICE pd, GENERIC_WORKORDER gw, (select GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK,JSON_OBJECTAGG(ENTITY_TYPE,ENTITY_VALUE) as meta from GWO_META where ENTITY_TYPE in ('connectivitySyncInterval','countThreshold','emailList') group by GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK) gwo,NV_DEVICE nv, DEVICE_INFO di where p.STEALTH_TASK_RESULT_FK=str.ID and str.STEALTH_TASK_DETAIL_FK=std.ID and std.PROBE_DEVICE_FK=pd.ID and pd.NVDEVICE_FK=nv.ID and nv.DEVICE_INFO_FK=di.ID and std.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK=gw.ID and gwo.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK=gw.ID and p.KPI='Connectivity' and (DATE_ADD(p.MODIFIED_TIME,INTERVAL JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(gwo.META,'$.connectivitySyncInterval')) SECOND) >= now()) and JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(gwo.META,'$.connectivitySyncInterval')) is not null and notified=1 and str.STATUS = 'INPROGRESS' and gw.STATUS not in ('COMPLETED') and p.STATUS='Pass'
Database Connection Pooling Service,SQL select query,Record Mode,Max Wait Time
Class Name,Java Custom Code,Cache Entry Identifier

select p.MODIFIED_TIME as eventTime,'CONNECTIVITY FAILURE' as alarmKPI, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(gwo.META,'$.connectivitySyncInterval')) as thresholdValue,p.ID as probeDetailFk,"foresight-preprod@mobile-network.rakuten.net" as fromUserEmail,p.ID,case when p.SSRSRP is not null then cast(p.SSRSRP as signed) else '-' end as ssrsrp,case when p.SSSINR is not null then cast(p.SSSINR as signed) else '-' end as sssinr,case when p.NRPCI is not null then cast(p.NRPCI as signed) else '-' end as nrpci,'-' as nrCgi,'-' as nrCellId,'-' as gNodeBId,p.TECHNOLOGY as technology,'Fail' as status,1 as notified,CAST(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(gwo.META,'$.emailList'))as CHAR) as emailIds,p.COUNTER as counter,gw.ID,p.ID,p.LATITUDE as latitude,p.LONGITUDE as longitude,case when p.RSRP is not null then cast(p.RSRP as signed) else '-' end as rsrp,case when p.SINR is not null then round(p.SINR,1) else '-' end as sinr,case when p.PCI is not null then p.PCI else '-' end as pci,case when p.CGI is not null then cast(p.CGI as signed) else null end as cgi,case when p.ENODEB_ID is not null then p.ENODEB_ID else '-' end as enodebId,case when p.CELLID is not null then p.CELLID else '-' end as cellId,p.KPI,case when p.VALUE is not null and p.VALUE <> 'null' then p.VALUE else '-' end as value,p.ADDRESS as location,date_format(p.MODIFIED_TIME,'%h:%i:%s %p') as time,unix_timestamp(p.LAST_NOTIFIED_TIME) as lastnotifiedtime, unix_timestamp(DATE_ADD(p.MODIFIED_TIME,INTERVAL JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(gwo.META,'$.connectivitySyncInterval')) SECOND)) as modifiedtime,concat(case when hour(timediff(now(),p.LAST_NOTIFIED_TIME)) <> 0 then concat(hour(timediff(now(),p.LAST_NOTIFIED_TIME)),' hours ')else '' end,minute(timediff(now(),p.LAST_NOTIFIED_TIME))) as lastReportedTime,pd.PROBE_NAME as userName,di.DEVICE_ID as deviceId,gw.WORKORDER_ID as workorderid ,CAST(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(gwo.META,'$.countThreshold')) as DECIMAL) as counterThreshold from PROBE_DETAIL p , STEALTH_TASK_RESULT str, STEALTH_TASK_DETAIL std, GENERIC_WORKORDER gw, (select GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK,JSON_OBJECTAGG(ENTITY_TYPE,ENTITY_VALUE) as meta from GWO_META where ENTITY_TYPE in ('connectivitySyncInterval','countThreshold','emailList') group by GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK) gwo,PROBE_DEVICE pd, NV_DEVICE nv, DEVICE_INFO di where p.STEALTH_TASK_RESULT_FK=str.ID and str.STEALTH_TASK_DETAIL_FK=std.ID and std.PROBE_DEVICE_FK=pd.ID and pd.NVDEVICE_FK=nv.ID and nv.DEVICE_INFO_FK=di.ID and std.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK=gw.ID and gw.ID = gwo.GENERIC_WORKORDER_FK and p.KPI='Connectivity' and (now() >= DATE_ADD(p.MODIFIED_TIME,INTERVAL JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(gwo.META,'$.connectivitySyncInterval')) SECOND)) and JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(gwo.META,'$.connectivitySyncInterval')) is not null and ( p.COUNTER > 0 or notified=0) and str.STATUS = 'INPROGRESS' and gw.STATUS not in ('COMPLETED')
Database Connection Pooling Service,SQL select query,Record Mode,Max Wait Time
